title: bc端怎么添加子服务器，找不到教程，求截图
author: xida233

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-8-30 16:29 编辑 

按照此格式添加：
  服务器名（必须英文）:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'#这个不用改
    address: localhost:端口号
    restricted: false

例子：
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:27569
    restricted: false
  1710fs1:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:36891
    restricted: false
  1122fs1:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:36892
    restricted: false
  1710fs2:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:36893
    restricted: false
  1122fs2:
    motd: '&1Just another Waterfall - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:36894
    restricted: false
其中lobby代表登录服，其他行  填各个子服

另请参阅：

【新版】BungeeCord群组服搭建教程（简直是傻瓜式的）
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-771295-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)


【天空学院】BungeeCord跨服群组搭建标准教程
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-450015-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)
